html:
Google Play's Indie Games Fund in Latin America is returning for its fourth year. We're committing $2 million for another 10 indie game studios, bringing our total investment to $8 million USD.

Since its start, the fund has helped selected studios expand, refine games and reach new audiences. "The IGF was a pivotal moment for our studio, boosting us to the next level and helping us form lasting connections,” notes Enrique Rivas, co-founder of Vish Game Studio, a past recipient.

Selected small game studios in Latin America will receive a share of the $2 million fund and hands-on support. If you’ve launched a game on any platform, you could receive $150,000 to $200,000 to elevate your game.

Check eligibility and apply now on our website. Applications close 12:00 PM BRT on July 31, 2025.
